org.openimaj.image.contour

Class SuzukiNeighborStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.image.contour.ContourFollowingStrategy
      • org.openimaj.image.contour.SuzukiNeighborStrategy

  • @Reference(type=Article,
           author={"Suzuki, S.","Abe, K."},
           title="Topological Structural Analysis of Digitized Binary Image by Border Following",
           year="1985",
           journal="Computer Vision, Graphics and Image Processing",
           pages={"32","46"},
           month="January",
           number="1",
           volume="30")
public class SuzukiNeighborStrategy
extends ContourFollowingStrategy
    The neighbourhood border/contour tracing algorithm described in Appendix 1 of the Suzuki contour detection algorithm
    Author:
    Sina Samangooei (ss@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void contour(FImage image, Pixel start, Pixel from, Operation<Pixel> operation)
      Given some starting pixel in an image on a contour and the direction of a non starting image, return each pixel on a contour from the start pixel in the image.
      void directedContour(FImage image, Pixel ij, Pixel i2j2, Operation<IndependentPair<Pixel,boolean[]>> operation)
      Directed contour following.

    • Method Detail

      • contour

        public void contour(FImage image,
           Pixel start,
           Pixel from,
           Operation<Pixel> operation)
        Description copied from class: ContourFollowingStrategy
        Given some starting pixel in an image on a contour and the direction of a non starting image, return each pixel on a contour from the start pixel in the image. The first pixel returned must be the start pixel
        Specified by:
        contour in class ContourFollowingStrategy
        Parameters:
        image - the image
        start - the first point on the contour
        from - the pixel that was not a contour
        operation - the thing to do for each contour pixel found

      • directedContour

        public void directedContour(FImage image,
                   Pixel ij,
                   Pixel i2j2,
                   Operation<IndependentPair<Pixel,boolean[]>> operation)
        Directed contour following.
        Parameters:
        image - the image
        ij - the first pixel
        i2j2 - the second pixel
        operation - the operation to perform
